#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pi;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pl;



int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.in", "r", stdin);
#endif
    int T, n, x;
    cin >> T;

    while(T--){
        cin >> n;
        int maxi;
        cin >> maxi;
        for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){
            cin >> x;
            maxi = max(maxi, x);
        }
        cout << maxi << '\n';
    }

    return 0;
}
